title: Can't login
body:
Hello,

I signed up for the alpha and got a email today that I was accepted and downloaded the new client.
However before I got this letter I switched servers from EUW to NA and I guess I can't login because of that.
I did download the new client on NA though.

replies.body:
The Alpha Client would have been assigned to your EUW account, so transferring may have definitely caused the invite to not work for you. The open beta is coming soon, though, so you'll have access to the new client then. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
